title: Afghan Girl
description: This iconic photograph, titled 'Afghan Girl,' features Sharbat Gula, a young Pashtun orphan who was residing in a refugee camp in Pakistan during the Soviet-Afghan War. Captured by photojournalist Steve McCurry, the image became globally famous after being featured on the cover of National Geographic in June 1985. The girl's piercing green eyes and intense expression symbolize the resilience and plight of refugees.
